title: 606 - Your Mom's House with Christina P and Tom Segura
description:
SPONSORS: - Go to https://saatva.com/theshit for $200 off your order. - Download the 5 star-rated puzzle game, Best Fiends FREE today on the App Store or Google Play. - Get 25% off and zero delivery fees on your first order of $15 or more when you download the DoorDash app and enter code YMH. - Go to https://brooklinen.com and use promo code HOUSE to get $20 off, with a minimum purchase of $100. - Go to https://getquip.com/MOM to get a FREE plastic dispenser with any refill plan. - Try BlueChew FREE when you go to https://bluechew.com and use our promo code MOM at checkout (just pay $5 shipping).

LIVE LIFE 365!! This week, Tom Segura and Christina P discuss their move to Austin, Texas, the YMH Live show in West Palm Beach, Florida, getting excited by nature, eating scrum, and shaving pubic hair. They watch videos of a woman crashing her car while on Instagram Live, a cool guy explaining why Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez is hot, Kevin Samuels being brutally honest with a larger woman, a pan flute "dad boner," YMH All-Star Robert Paul Champagne's new TikTok video, a prank call by Fart Simpson featuring Unkle Shine and more! Tom also shares a video of his mom, Charo, dancing drunk, as well as the cool heat storm he witnessed in Florida.
